name: Five Nights at Freddy's (GB Game)
description:
The year is 20XX, and you've accepted a job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. The job? The night shift. What could go wrong? What skeletons could be waiting for you to open their closet?  

Fnaf GB is a Gameboy game made for the Gameboy and is a point and click adventure game created in GBStudio. The game is best played on a Gameboy color with a flash cart but an emulator for the GBA also works well.
